title: Split Worlds
description: SPLIT WORLDS is a natural, sexy and down-to-earth, 'lifestyle art' pictorial magazine that pushes the boundaries ever so slightly. However, it does so with class, sophistication and style. It showcases the very sexy cover model of ‘The Non-Silence of the LAMB’ which is an island style novel in a class of its own.SPLIT WORLDS pictorial art magazine is also in a class of its own. It is a hot and sexy American-Caribbean magazine. It boldly displays many colorful photos of the beautiful, young, sexy, 'teenage-perfect' body and charm of our sassy, fun-loving, Latin-American cover model. It does so only with the pride and joy of her natural beauty. See her now in our 2012 issue in her two worlds with her many charming personalities.
author: Berthalicia Fonseca-Brown
